DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety effectiveness provide 2-methoxyestradiol patient plateau phase relapse multiple myeloma . Information regard trough 2ME2 level also collect .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 Study With Panzem Patients With Relapsed Plateau Phase Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have plateau phase ( patient previously treat least one conventional highdose chemotherapy currently therapy least 4 week consider stable disease ) relapse MM . Patients plateau phase must Mprotein concentration stable least 4 week prior registration . 2 . Be least 18 year age . 3 . Have monoclonal plasma cell marrow . 4. Mprotein great equal 1g/dL serum 200 mg monoclonal light chain 24hour urine protein electrophoresis . 5 . Have laboratory data specify : AST ALT < 2.5 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) Alk phos < 5.0 x ULN direct bilirubin < 2 x ULN Creatinine < 3.0 x ULN ANC great equal 750 cells/mm3 Platelets > 25,000/mm3 Hemoglobin great equal 7.0g/dL 6 . Have life expectancy least 3 month 7 . Have ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 8 . Women men child bear potential must agree use effective barrier contraceptive method study . 9 . Have ability understand reuirements study , provide write informed consent , abide study restriction , agree return require assessment . 1 . Be pregnant nursing . 2 . Have condition likely detrimentally affect regular follow . 3 . Have history myocardial infarction within last 3 month , angina pectoris/angina equivalent last 3 month , uncontrolled congestive heart failure . 4 . Have active infection 5 . Have major surgery within 21 day start 2ME2 administration 6 . Have additional uncontrolled serious medical psychiatric illness 7. active cancer addition MM within last 5 year ( exclude superficial skin cancer ) 8 . Have uncontrolled untreated active bleeding thrombotic disorder .
